name: mapswitcher
description: Switch between different map services. Convert coordinates and directions and jump to the same location on another map.

scripts.build:resources: cp -r html css image vendor manifest.json release
scripts.build:js: for srcFile in src/*.js ; do terser $srcFile -c --mangle -o release/$srcFile ; done
scripts.build:release: mkdir -p release/src &&  npm run build:resources && npm run build:js
scripts.build: npm run clean:release && npm run build:release && npm run zip:release

author: David R Edgar
